entry.title: Sophos XG Firewall SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sophos XG Firewall SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-12271

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 在Sophos XG Firewall设备上发现了一个SQL注入问题，影响了配置了管理（HTTPS）服务或在WAN区域暴露了用户门户的设备。成功的攻击可能导致远程代码执行，泄露本地设备管理员、门户管理员和用于远程访问的用户账户的用户名和哈希密码（但不包括外部Active Directory或LDAP密码）。

产品厂商： Sophos

产品名称： Sophos XG Firewall

影响版本： 17.0, 17.1, 17.5, 18.0 before 2020-04-25

搜索语法： http.title:”sophos”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12499

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

A SQL injection issue was found in SFOS 17.0, 17.1, 17.5, and 18.0 before 2020-04-25 on Sophos XG Firewall devices, as exploited in the wild in April 2020. This affected devices configured with either the administration (HTTPS) service or the User Portal exposed on the WAN zone. A successful attack may have caused remote code execution that exfiltrated usernames and hashed passwords for the local device admin(s), portal admins, and user accounts used for remote access (but not external Active Directory or LDAP passwords)

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://news.sophos.com/en-us/2020/04/26/asnarok/

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"sophos"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sophos XG Firewall SQL注入漏洞

影响版本： SFOS 17.0, 17.1, 17.5, and 18.0 before 2020-04-25

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Oracle WebLogic Server 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Oracle WebLogic Server 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-2883

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Oracle WebLogic Server 存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可通过未认证的IIOP和T3协议访问，利用此漏洞可接管服务器。漏洞利用需要通过网络访问IIOP或T3协议。

产品厂商： Oracle

产品名称： WebLogic Server

影响版本： 10.3.6.0.0, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0

搜索语法： product:”oracle weblogic”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12228

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Oracle WebLogic Server (10.3.6.0.0, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0) contains a remote code execution caused by unauthenticated access via IIOP and T3 protocols, letting network attackers take over the server, exploit requires network access via IIOP or T3.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/Qynklee/POC_CVE-2020-2883
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/7960bb5df13e
  • https///github.com:Qynklee/POC_CVE-2020-2883.git
  • https://github.com/Al1ex/CVE-2020-2883
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/407219371c37
  • https///github.com:Al1ex/CVE-2020-2883.git
  • https://github.com/FancyDoesSecurity/CVE-2020-2883
  • https://github.com/Y4er/WebLogic-Shiro-shell
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/da7b6fb2895f
  • https///github.com:Y4er/WebLogic-Shiro-shell.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/9ab580b3f80b
  • https///gitee.com:akira09/exphub.git
  • https://github.com/ZZZWD/CVE-2020-2883
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/d55ddb5fac32
  • https///github.com:zzwlpx/weblogicPoc.git
  • https://github.com/MagicZer0/Weblogic_CVE-2020-2883_POC
  • https://github.com/Y4er/CVE-2020-2883
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/7927833b7021
  • https///github.com:Y4er/CVE-2020-2883.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/f0337df1320b
  • https///github.com:0xn0ne/weblogicScanner.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: product:"oracle weblogic"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Wing FTP Server 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wing FTP Server 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-47812

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Wing FTP Server 存在一个远程代码执行漏洞（CVE-2025-47812），该漏洞源于服务器在处理用户名参数时对NULL字节的不当处理，允许攻击者在会话文件中注入Lua代码。当加载有效会话时，这些恶意会话文件会被执行，导致服务器上的任意命令执行。此漏洞特别严重，因为Wing FTP Server通常默认以root（Linux）或SYSTEM（Windows）权限运行，使得攻击者能够在成功利用后获得对系统的最大控制权。

产品厂商： Wing FTP Server

产品名称： Wing FTP Server

影响版本： version < 7.4.4

来源： https://github.com/4m3rr0r/CVE-2025-47812-poc

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • 2025-07-01_18-22.png
  • CVE-2025-47812.py
  • LICENSE
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-47812

Wing FTP Server Remote Code Execution (RCE) Exploit (CVE-2025-47812)

This repository hosts a Python exploit for the Wing FTP Server Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability (CVE-2025-47812). This critical flaw allows attackers to achieve remote code execution as root/SYSTEM on affected Wing FTP Server instances, even with anonymous access enabled.

🚀 Overview

This vulnerability originates from Wing FTP Server’s improper handling of NULL bytes within the username parameter during the authentication process. This allows attackers to inject Lua code directly into session files. These malicious session files are then executed when a valid session is loaded, leading to arbitrary command execution on the server.

Key features of this exploit include:

  • Remote Code Execution: Execute any command you choose on the target server.
  • Root/SYSTEM Privileges: Often achieves RCE with the highest system privileges due to the default configurations of Wing FTP Server.
  • Anonymous Access Exploitation: Can be leveraged even if only anonymous logins are permitted on the server.
  • Batch Scanning: Scan multiple targets by providing a list of URLs from a file.
  • Custom Command Execution: Specify and run any command you need on the vulnerable server.

⚠️ Disclaimer

This tool is intended strictly for educational and authorized penetration testing purposes. The author bears no responsibility for any misuse or damage caused by this software. Always ensure you have explicit, written permission before conducting any tests on a system.

🔎 Vulnerability Details (CVE-2025-47812)

The CVE-2025-47812 vulnerability is a critical issue stemming from multiple weaknesses in how Wing FTP Server manages user authentication and sessions:

  1. NULL Byte Truncation in c_CheckUser(): The c_CheckUser() function, which is responsible for user authentication, internally uses strlen() on the provided username. When a NULL byte (%00) is injected into the username (e.g., anonymous%00...), strlen() truncates the string at this point. This means authentication succeeds for the portion of the username before the NULL byte, effectively bypassing proper validation.
  2. Full Username in Session Creation: Despite the authentication truncation, the rawset(_SESSION, "username", username) call within loginok.html uses the entire, unsanitized username directly from the GET or POST parameters. This includes the NULL byte and any subsequent characters.
  3. Lua Code Injection: Since session files are stored as Lua scripts, injecting Lua code after the NULL byte in the username (e.g., anonymous%00]]%0dlocal+h+%3d+io.popen("id")%0dlocal+r+%3d+h%3aread("*a")%0dh%3aclose()%0dprint(r)%0d--) results in this malicious code being written directly into the session file.
  4. Session File Execution: The SessionModule.load() function, invoked when any authenticated functionality (such as /dir.html) is accessed, directly executes the session file using loadfile(filepath) followed by f(). This crucial step triggers the injected Lua code, leading to Remote Code Execution.

This vulnerability is particularly severe because Wing FTP Server often runs with root privileges on Linux or SYSTEM privileges on Windows by default. This default configuration grants attackers maximum control over the compromised system upon successful exploitation.

Affected Versions: Wing FTP Server versions prior to 7.4.4 are vulnerable.

For a comprehensive explanation and technical deep-dive, please refer to the detailed blog post: What the NULL?! Wing FTP Server RCE (CVE-2025-47812)

🛠️ Usage Options

This script supports various command-line arguments to tailor its functionality.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wing FTP Server 远程代码执行漏洞

entry.title: Oracle WebLogic Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability - CVE-2020-2883
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Oracle WebLogic Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability - CVE-2020-2883

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-2883

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Oracle WebLogic Server产品中的漏洞（组件：Core）。受影响的支持版本为10.3.6.0.0、12.1.3.0.0、12.2.1.3.0和12.2.1.4.0。易受攻击的漏洞允许未经认证的攻击者通过网络通过IIOP、T3协议访问Oracle WebLogic Server。成功利用此漏洞可能导致Oracle WebLogic Server被接管。

产品厂商： Oracle

产品名称： Oracle WebLogic Server

影响版本： 10.3.6.0.0, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0

entry.title: Weblogic Remote Command Execution (RCE) Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Weblogic Remote Command Execution (RCE) Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-14644

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Weblogic 12.2.1.3.0、12.2.1.4.0和14.1.1.0.0版本因不当处理序列化对象而存在远程代码执行（RCE）漏洞。此模板利用CVE-2020-14644实现RCE。

产品厂商： Oracle

产品名称： Weblogic

影响版本： 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0, 14.1.1.0.0

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12428

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Is there an existing template for this?

  • I have searched the existing templates.

Template requests

  • …

id: CVE-2020-14644

info:
name: Weblogic Remote Command Execution (RCE) Vulnerability
author: MuhammadWaseem
severity: critical
description: |
Weblogic versions 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0, and 14.1.1.0.0 are vulnerable
to remote code execution (RCE) due to improper handling of serialized
objects. This template exploits CVE-2020-14644 to achieve RCE.
tags: weblogic,rce,cve2020,java

http:

  • raw:
    POST /wls-wsat/CoordinatorPortType HTTP/1.1Host: {{Hostname}}Content-Type: text/xmlConnection: close<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">  <soapenv:Header>    <wsa:Action>"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/transfer/Create"</wsa:Action>  </soapenv:Header>  <soapenv:Body>    <test>Exploit Payload</test>  </soapenv:Body></soapenv:Envelope>
    matchers-condition: and
    matchers:
    • type: status
      status:
      • 500
    • type: word
      part: body
      words:
      • “weblogic.wsee.jaxws.WsLoggingInterceptor”

Anything else?

id: CVE-2020-14644

info:
name: Weblogic Remote Command Execution (RCE) Vulnerability
author: MuhammadWaseem
severity: critical
description: |
Weblogic versions 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0, and 14.1.1.0.0 are vulnerable
to remote code execution (RCE) due to improper handling of serialized
objects. This template exploits CVE-2020-14644 to achieve RCE.
tags: weblogic,rce,cve2020,java

http:

  • raw:
    POST /wls-wsat/CoordinatorPortType HTTP/1.1Host: {{Hostname}}Content-Type: text/xmlConnection: close<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">  <soapenv:Header>    <wsa:Action>"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/transfer/Create"</wsa:Action>  </soapenv:Header>  <soapenv:Body>    <test>Exploit Payload</test>  </soapenv:Body></soapenv:Envelope>
    matchers-condition: and
    matchers:
    • type: status
      status:
      • 500
    • type: word
      part: body
      words:
      • “weblogic.wsee.jaxws.WsLoggingInterceptor”

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： vBulletin 5.0.0至5.7.5和6.0.0至6.0.3版本在PHP 8.1或更高版本上存在认证绕过漏洞，由于对ReflectionMethod::invoke()及其类似方法的内部调整，默认允许通过PHP的Reflection API调用受保护/私有方法，导致未经认证的攻击者可以远程调用受保护的API控制器方法，成功利用此漏洞的攻击者可以以Web服务器用户身份执行任意系统命令，导致系统完全被控制。

产品厂商： vbulletin

产品名称： vbulletin

影响版本： 5.0.0 <= version <= 5.7.5, 6.0.0 <= version <= 6.0.3

搜索语法： app=”vBulletin”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/6f41aaeec41871233b23a1bfd1edafe97f0a1629/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-48827.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： vBulletin 认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：</

entry.title: ManageEngine OpManager SumPDU Java反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： ManageEngine OpManager SumPDU Java反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-28653

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： ManageEngine OpManager Smart Update Manager组件中的一个HTTP端点可以被利用来反序列化任意Java对象。未经身份验证的远程攻击者可滥用此漏洞在OpManager应用程序的上下文中执行操作系统命令（在Windows上为NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM，在Linux上为root）。此漏洞也存在于基于OpManager应用程序构建的其他产品中。此漏洞影响OpManager版本12.1至12.5.232。

产品厂商： zohocorp

产品名称： ManageEngine OpManager

影响版本： 12.1 <= version <= 12.5.232

搜索语法： http.title:”opmanager plus” OR http.title:”opmanager” OR title=”opmanager plus” OR title=”opmanager” OR intitle:”opmanager plus” OR intitle:”opmanager”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/00c05f4901ae712b72d1d99b90e3d1fd53317ffe/http%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-28653.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： ManageEngine OpManager SumPDU Java反序列化漏

entry.title: Sophos Firewall SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sophos Firewall SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-12271

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 在Sophos XG Firewall设备的SFOS 17.0、17.1、17.5和18.0版本中，发现了一个SQL注入问题，该问题在2020年4月被野外利用。这影响了配置了管理（HTTPS）服务或在WAN区域暴露了用户门户的设备。成功的攻击可能导致远程代码执行，泄露本地设备管理员、门户管理员和用于远程访问的用户账户的用户名和哈希密码（但不包括外部Active Directory或LDAP密码）。

产品厂商： Sophos

产品名称： Sophos XG Firewall

影响版本： SFOS 17.0, 17.1, 17.5, and 18.0 before 2020-04-25

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/eaa605d6a345dde2bf79635422b455764e89c54e/http%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-12271.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sophos Firewall SQL注入漏洞
